This is an exclusive offer tailored just for you, considering your interest and the benefits this product can bring to your needs. Don't miss out on this opportunity to save while experiencing the exceptional features of our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
(2) Reject Alice's offer
